title: White Heron Tea and Coffee
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Tea and coffee shop with in-house bakery and kitchen. Uses local produce, and drinks are certified organic. Has marked vegan food on the menu, a few vegan baked goods, and could add vegan bacon and tofu to a sandwich, wrap, or salad.
